metadata.title: CVE-2018-17572 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
InfluxDB 0.9.5 has Reflected XSS in the Write Data module.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

influxdb - 0.10.0+dfsg1-1
influxdb-client - 0.10.0+dfsg1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: influxdb package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.0+dfsg1-1').
